name: A New Chapter
description:
2d endless wave combat with meta progression upgrades.

(use FullScreen)

This game is a endless wave combat game with meta progression, the player moves around the world avoiding enemies and using automatic attacks to kill enemies and gain exp, as the game goes on the player will level up and get stronger also the enemies will get harder to kill(more health, faster, amount increase) every couple minutes a boss will spawn with more health the player is rewarded with a chest for killing a boss and may gain health exp or new attacks from the chest, the goal of the game is to go as long as possible. When a player dies they will keep the gold they earnt that round to spend on permanent upgrades to enable them to get further next round.
